"Xiera": "Jet Boots <red>change their attribute<c> whenever you cast a charged Technique."

"ãƒ»Charge the Foie set on your
\u3000Subpalette to fill the Gear Gauge"

"If you have learned the Class Skill \"Jet Boots Gear\", a Gear Gauge will be added to the top of your Main Palette.

The Gear Gauge fills when you hit with Jet Boots attacks or cast charged Techniques."

"When the Gear Gauge fills, it adds an elemental effect to your Jet Boots, and increases the power and range of your Normal Attacks. Photon Arts' power also increases.

You can give your Jet Boots an elemental effect different from their normal attribute by charging and casting a Technique."
